There is a reason why this game receives overwhelmingly positive reviews on Steam. It is the best fps game I have ever played in my entire life. There are no words to describe how much I miss playing this game. This game literally started the fps genre in computer gaming. I spent over 500 hours of my time playing this game and I loved every minute of it. CSGO is nothing like it. I recommend this game to everyone. It is the best!
